definition: next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time

sentences.english: Beattie's solution to the Franklin mystery took four expeditions and Simonson is not expecting miracles.
sentences.chinese: 比泰决心解开富兰克林探险队作过四次探险运动之迷。

sentences.english: They were also very dirty and their hair smelled even after four washings, the report said.
sentences.chinese: 两人身上很脏，头发洗了四次仍散发着恶臭。

sentences.english: The fourth Lateran Council, in 1215, was of crucial importance.
sentences.chinese: 第四次拉特兰会，在1215年，是至关重要的。

sentences.english: I’m fortunate because this will be my fourth time participating in the Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 我很幸运，因为这将是我第四次参加奥林匹克运动会。

sentences.english: Now he surfs three or four times a week.
sentences.chinese: 现在他每周都去冲浪三四次。

sentences.english: You will be in the danger of failing the course if you exceed four absences.
sentences.chinese: 如果你缺席超过四次，这个科目你将有被当掉的危险。

sentences.english: For example, Taipei has four flights to Rangoon a week.
sentences.chinese: 例如，台北和仰光之间每周有四次航班。

sentences.english: A complete quartic polynomial consists of 15 terms.
sentences.chinese: 一个完整四次的多项式由15项组成。

sentences.english: He has traveled there four times previously for visits and training.
sentences.chinese: 他曾四次到中国访问和参加训练。

sentences.english: Tracing the flow would show four propagations in exactly the same way as the other examples.
sentences.chinese: 跟踪该流表明了四次与其他示例完全相同的传播。

sentences.english: Doing the job WRONG fourteen times gives you job security.
sentences.chinese: 连续十四次把工作做错让你保住工作。

sentences.english: On Thursday morning, helicopters operated by Japan's self-defense forces made four passes over the plant's No. 3 reactor to dump water.
sentences.chinese: 周四早上，日本自卫队的直升机四次对3号厂房注水。

sentences.english: And after the fourth wearing the flapping of the outsole was a very obvious annoyance.
sentences.chinese: 第四次穿的时候，外底的来回移动就让我非常的烦恼。

sentences.english: He finished regulation time with only four fouls.
sentences.chinese: 他在在这段调整时间内仅仅领到四次犯规。

sentences.english: Four times the Major Sabbats mark in the light and in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 四次大型的夜半集会做标记于光明和黑暗里面。

sentences.english: In the next twenty years it went through fourteen editions.
sentences.chinese: 在后来的二十年里，该书再版了十四次。

definition: second (i.e. number two)/second time/twice/(math.) quadratic (of degree two)
number of times/frequency/order number (in a series)/power (math.)/degree of a polynomial (math.)
next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
